'''Fu San'er''' {{Lang|zh=傅三儿|zh_rm=Fù Sān'er}} is a quest-exclusive [[NPC]] that appears in [[Chongyun]]'s [[Hangout Event]] ''[[Signs of Evil]]''. He and [[Zhouliang]] were running a couple event called the [[Test of Courage]] at [[Wuwang Hill]].
